name: Capy Island
description:
Capy Island is a Senior Capstone Project made by Sawfish Studios, a group of fourth-year Interactive Multimedia & Design students at Carleton University. The game was created over the course of 2 semesters, starting from September 2022 to April 2023. The project makes use of multidisciplinary skills learned throughout the program, including programming, 2D/3D art, UI/UX design, and more.
